tha-ap208:0.3_0: Hearing his breast, the senior monks, and the junior ones.
tha-ap208:1.4_0: of the birds in the sky.
tha-ap208:2.3_0: When continued existence has become extinguished,
tha-ap208:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap208:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap208:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable senior venerable Dīgha Tapassī.
tha-ap208:7.1_0: sixth senior monk who is a sixth maker;
